report.title: Simple Location List
report.description: : Used by the Dynamic Location Form to retrieve the locations associated with a survey and user.
report.query: SELECT l.id, l.name, l.centroid_sref, (select count(*) from samples s where s.location_id = l.id and s.deleted = FALSE) as num_samples FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id = l.id and lw.deleted = false WHERE CAST(l.created_by_id AS character varying)='#iUserID#' AND l.deleted = FALSE AND lw.website_id = '#website_id#' #order_by#

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM websites

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Something has gone wrong as you are logged in to the system but do not have an ID
